title: Best of The Herd: 09/04/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/04/2019
description:
Colin says that the Cowboys are still Dak's team and that was made evident with the deal that Jerry Jones gave Ezekiel Elliott.  He respects the way the Rams do business and signed their franchise QB without anything leaking to the media.  Plus, FS1's Nick Wright makes his playoff predictions with Colin and one team will definitely surprise you 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
